name: Opus One 2018
description: A prestigious Napa blend with aromas of blackberry, cassis, and subtle herbs. Full-bodied with firm tannins and a long, refined finish.

name: Château d'Yquem Sauternes 2015
description: An exquisite dessert wine with intense notes of apricot, honey, and exotic spices. Perfectly balanced sweetness with a long, luxurious finish.

name: Whispering Angel Rosé 2020
description: A pale pink rosé with delicate aromas of strawberry, peach, and rose petals. Light-bodied with a crisp, dry finish.

name: Kistler Vineyards Sonoma Mountain Chardonnay 2019
description: A rich California Chardonnay with notes of ripe pear, butter, and vanilla. Full-bodied with a creamy texture and a long, oak-influenced finish.

name: Sassicaia 2017
description: A legendary Super Tuscan with complex aromas of blackcurrant, Mediterranean herbs, and oak. Full-bodied with refined tannins and a long, sophisticated finish.

name: Ruinart Blanc de Blancs NV
description: An elegant champagne with delicate notes of citrus, white flowers, and fresh bread. Crisp and refreshing with fine bubbles and a clean finish.

name: Bollinger Special Cuvée NV
description: A rich and complex champagne with notes of baked apple, brioche, and subtle spice. Full-bodied with fine bubbles and a long finish.

name: La Rioja Alta Gran Reserva 904 2011
description: An elegant Rioja with aromas of red fruit, vanilla, and tobacco. Well-structured with silky tannins and a long, refined finish.

description: A prestigious white Burgundy with notes of citrus, white flowers, and subtle oak. Rich and balanced with a long, mineral-driven finish.

description: A sophisticated Napa blend with notes of blackberry, cedar, and subtle minerality. Full-bodied with firm tannins and a long, refined finish.

description: A luxurious champagne with complex notes of citrus, nuts, and baked bread. Rich and full-bodied with fine bubbles and an incredibly long finish.
